title: log in to boards isnt automatic
body: might just be my end, but when i go to boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com i dont log in automatically (even though its saved). however if i press "log in" it begins going to the "enter login info" screen but then logs me in (as if remembering my info). its like walking into a shop, picking a book, walking up the counter. the salesperson is there looking straight at you. you stand there at the counter looking straight at her. its pretty awkward. you glance at your watch. back to her. scratch the back of your head. finally you say "hey can i buy this book" "of course sir! let me just scan that for you. would you like a bag? how was your day...". its almost automatic but its not. pls help :(

replies.body: Having the same problem. Initially thought it was due to a recent ticket submission through Support, which tend to cause "log in" issues if you don't handle the log in processes properly. Made sure I was logged out properly on both Boards and Support, still had the issue. I then decided to attempt clearing my browser history/cache, because I figured it was probably related to that, still no dice. Have ensured, on each attempted fix, to check the "remember me" box. Can't think of any reason it should be happening (or any potential fix on my end), but it is painfully annoying considering I check in on the boards several times a day.
